1. 27-inch iMac models introduced in 2014 or later.

1. 13-inch MacBook Pro models introduced in late 2012 or later. 
   Native resolution: 2560 x 1600 (16:10) at 227 ppi.
   Support for millions of colors.
   Approx 11 x 7 in.
